title: Depressout
shortDescription: Social project created for the "Zwolnieni z Teorii" event.
longDescription: A blog written in Nuxtjs for the "Zwolnieni z Teorii" Olympiad. We want to reach the widest possible audience, so the site is in mint colors. The site is available only in Polish.

title: Bartoginski Portfolio
longDescription: Personal website created by Bartosz Ogiński for myself. Written in Nuxtjs with Tailwindcss. I like modern look, that's why it is in unusual colors.
